name: Killagun 2D
description:
What is Killagun 2D?

  • Killagun 2D is a straight forward space shmup prototype for 1 or 2 players!
  • It's FREE if you don't want to donate for further development!
  • Fun fact: "ZWADE" is the Austrian dialect for "2D"
  • Was built for a custom made arcade

What do you get now?

1-2 Players | 1 Stage | 1 Boss | Weapon Upgrades | 5 Enemy types | Highscore System (local)

Anonymous survey

Please fill out anonymous survey after playing

https://de.surveymonkey.com/r/B8RGFMY

Please donate

I want to add more stages, more enemies, more bosses - more of everything!

||| Please keep in mind -This is still a prototype and not a final commercial product! |||

THX a lot and HAVE FUN!

New Year Release Teaser

[Controls]

[Common]
Quit game - ALT + F4
ENTER - start / confirm

[Menu]
F1 - one player
F2 - two players
C - toggle credits screen
F5 - reset highscore

[Game]

[P1 Keyboard + Mouse]
WASD - move ship
Mouse L - fire primary weapons
Mouse R - fire laser beam
Mouse M - fire bomb / confirm

[P2 Keyboard]
UJHK - move ship
O - fire primary weapons
P - fire laser beam
L - fire bomb

[P1/P2 Gamepad]
D-PAD - move ship (recommended)
Left stick - move ship (not recommended)
A - fire primary weapons
X - fire laser beam
Y - fire bomb / confirm
